measured_by: Hierarchical Drift Diffusion Model threshold parameter (a)
justification: "The threshold (a) corresponds to the amount of information necessary for the individual to make a decision … Parameter estimates were derived … using Bayesian Hierarchical estimation of the Drift-Diffusion Model (HDDM)."

measured_by: Hierarchical Drift Diffusion Model drift rate parameter (v)
justification: "The drift rate (v) corresponds to the rate at which decision-relevant information is extracted from the stimulus array … estimates were derived … with HDDM."

measured_by: Hierarchical Drift Diffusion Model non-decision time parameter (t)
justification: "The non-decisional parameter (t) corresponds to components of the response not related to decision making, for example, sensory encoding, motor planning, or motor execution … estimated with the HDDM."
